sweeten.translation[0].definitions[0].de: to make something sweeter, or become sweeter
sweeten.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: Sweeten the mixture with a little honey.
sweeten.translation[0].definitions[1].de: to try to persuade someone to do what you want, by giving them presents or money or promising them something
sweeten.translation[0].definitions[1].ex: a cash bonus to sweeten the deal
sweeten.translation[0].definitions[2].de: to make someone kinder, gentler etc
sweeten.translation[0].definitions[2].ex: Old age had not sweetened her.
sweeten.translation[1].definitions[0].de: to make an offer, suggestion etc seem more attractive in order to encourage someone to accept it
sweeten.translation[1].definitions[0].ex: The British auto maker has sweetened its customer incentives by adding credit facilities.
